title: Where is the oceanic skin that was promised.

embed.description: Ok so it has been a very long time of promises and excuses towards why the oceanic server did not get a skin (yet?) like russia, thailand, korea,...

body:
Ok so it has been a very long time of promises and excuses towards why the oceanic server did not get a skin (yet?) like russia, thailand, korea, or italy had - cavalry sejuani, muay thai lee sin, masked shaco, gladiator draven.

I remember quite clearly that a Riot employee stated that there was a skin, but wasn't going to be soon because they needed to hire a community manager or something of that sort to make final decisions because of the various cultures that are encased within oceania, and I know for a fact now that Riot games oceania has a community manager tasked towards producing this skin, but with the time frame that is more ridiculous that an ultimate skin.
That being said, here is a thread from over a year ago, with a rioter saying we were going to be getting one...

http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=283998#283998

"That said, the server skin has not been forgotten about - we had a meeting about it last week actually, and we're working with the skins team to make it happen."

Also a lot of people just say that well we got pool party ziggs for coming to oceania, no...we didn't, some of us got that for participating in the open beta environment for the oceanic servers when servers weren't as stable as they are now. In the post the Rioter attests to this fact.
Here is a link of when the server transfers were available.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/league-legends-lands-oceania

So it has been 2 years + since the release of the oceanic server as open beta...

There is no shortage of ideas, and I do understand the situation that Riot is in being that culturally they want the skin to reflect upon everyone but there is no way it should take this amount of time, even with all the community suggestions that we're supposedly handed over to the design team working on it.
Rito pls?

Help me upvote on reddit so that this gets more traction if you think it needs it.

replies.body: What's the big deal? Just a skin, so why do you care so much? Haha. Most of us probably wouldn't even use it anyway, so the idea is silly.

just ... a ... skin. **JUST A SKIN**.  *IIIII CARRRRE*. We could be paying for a skin that we can get fo free. I want anything thats free. Man I got a twitter to get dn Garen and I haven't used it since. Who cares it's free.
Do they still do dn garen?

> [{quoted}](name=Mid Dumbledore,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XEqHBbOX,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2015-01-08T13:42:42.089+0000)
>
> just ... a ... skin. **JUST A SKIN**.  *IIIII CARRRRE*. We could be paying for a skin that we can get fo free. I want anything thats free. Man I got a twitter to get dn Garen and I haven't used it since. Who cares it's free.

%%%%, you got me there... did that too... and got Riot Girl Tristana which I never use.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XEqHBbOX,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-06T09:38:38.757+0000)
>
> What's the big deal? Just a skin, so why do you care so much? Haha. Most of us probably wouldn't even use it anyway, so the idea is silly.

> Just a skin

people kill for skins

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XEqHBbOX,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-01-06T09:46:15.476+0000)
>
> people kill for skins

I wish you could buy them just for IP so saying that would have more effect.
People didn't care the first thousand times this kind of thing was posted, what makes you think they'll care now?

Because not everybody on the internet is as cynical as you, and community pressure can maybe not speed the process, but definitely give us an understanding of an expected time frame (if there even is one) ad further information about the skin if it is indeed actually coming or not.

I'm being apathetic, not cynical. Quite frankly many people don't care about an OCE skin anymore and they'd much rather just play the game. If it happens it happens but there's no point bothering to try and force Riot into hurrying it up, it's not like they'll listen to use anyway. This is OCE after all.
Sad but true.
Well lots of people complained about my comments. However the entire Pool Party Skins are themed as the OCE skins but seriously its just a bunch of skins lel.

Its the principle, not the skin itself. 
If you promise people something they will be more likely to not let you live it down.
It was Pool Party Ziggs for Oceania. I have it myself on my account.
no it wasnt. that was a FREE skin. the region skin is one you have to pay for.
The region skin is actually free, the ziggs was for the beta, but the greeks got cassiopeia skin, the italians got draven, and the russians got bear cavalry sejuani (and so on) for free.

nope, the sej skin wasnt free. i was on the ruskies server from the start, there was just a big thing about it being a skin for the region.
greeks and italians...WTF dude, they dont have specific servers for those regions.

there was only the sej skin and the morg skin. the morg skin wasnt free to LAN, and neither was the BC sej.

> [{quoted}](name=jomoko2012,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XEqHBbOX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-06T08:27:17.548+0000)
>
> It was Pool Party Ziggs for Oceania. I have it myself on my account.

no it wasn't.

it hasn't been made cause it's too hard.
Pool Party Ziggs is the skin given to people who play on OCE during it's Beta, it's **NOT** the OCE skin. Did you bother reading the OP?

"So it has been 2 years + since the release of the oceanic server as open beta..."

bull%%%%, it was july 2013. you stupid %%%%. dont lie just because the YEAR number is 2 different, its been a year and a HALF!

So am I a stupid %%%% or am I lying, because I cannot be both in this context, blatantly obvious you are indeed an idiot.

Calm down and understand how I made this mistake, (if I even made one) the website says it was posted "2 years ago" that is where i got my information.

> Help me upvote on reddit so that this gets more traction if you think it needs it.

You'll probably be shadowbanned. Asking for upvotes is against reddits rules and the admins take that pretty seriously.
Didn't ask for upvotes on reddit (only on here), also don't think it will matter regardless.
People %%%%%ed about it too much so Riot said "%%%% 'em" so we are getting nothing.
